text: وَدَخَلَ مَعَهُ ٱلسِّجۡنَ فَتَيَانِۖ قَالَ أَحَدُهُمَآ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَعۡصِرُ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡأٓخَرُ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَحۡمِلُ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِي خُبۡزٗا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِنۡهُۖ نَبِّئۡنَا بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّا نَرَىٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

translation.en: And there entered the prison with him two young men. One of them said, "Indeed, I have seen myself [in a dream] pressing wine." The other said, "Indeed, I have seen myself carrying upon my head [some] bread, from which the birds were eating. Inform us of its interpretation; indeed, we see you to be of those who do good
translation.id: (Dan bersama dia masuk pula dua orang pemuda ke dalam penjara.412) Salah satunya berkata, "Sesungguhnya aku bermimpi memeras anggur," dan yang lainnya berkata, "Aku bermimpi, membawa roti di atas kepalaku, sebagiannya dimakan burung." Berikanlah kepada kami takwilnya. Sesungguhnya kami memandangmu termasuk orang yang berbuat baik
